channel.title: Max players in one spot
channel.description: How do I make it where only the ammount of people I put can go in a certain area? I have posted this before, and the person who told me how didn't finish his sentence... Don't ask why I want this because I don't fill like replying to that XD.

item.title: Max players in one spot
item.dc:creator: @Goddess Goddess
item.description:
@Goddess wrote:

truly what you will need to do is create a void that measures the amount of people in an area. so first set the parameters for the certain areas. and say

if (insert coord string) && (playeramount == #) {
teleport = false;
}

or something of that nature. but the easiest way to do it. would be like to make the area a tele to only place. or fence the area in and make players click on a door or gate or something to allow them to enter and if the players within allotted coords is above X amount then then the teleport will not happen. That is the theory behind it im not telling you exactly how. ALSO you will have to create a player counter void which i dubbed playeramount which i am not exactly sure how you would go about doing since there are many ways. GL

Read full topic
